speaker: President.
english:
President. – The debate is closed.
The vote will take place on Thursday at 11 a.m.
(The sitting was suspended at 8.15 p.m. and resumed at 9 p.m.)
original:
President. – The debate is closed.
The vote will take place on Thursday at 11 a.m.
(The sitting was suspended at 8.15 p.m. and resumed at 9 p.m.)
agenda_item: Discharges for the implementation of the European Union general budget for the financial year 2004 (debate)
